What type of room can I book at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain?

Hotel Moderne Saint Germain offers the following activities / services (charges may apply):

Games room

How far is Hotel Moderne Saint Germain from the centre of Paris?
Hotel Moderne Saint Germain is 950 m from the centre of Paris.
How much does it cost to stay at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain?
The prices at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain may vary depending on your stay (e.g. dates you select, hotel's policy etc.). See the prices by entering your dates.
What kind of breakfast is served at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain?
Guests staying at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain can enjoy a highly-rated breakfast during their stay (guest review score: 7.8).

Breakfast option(s) include:

Continental
Buffet

Facilities of Hotel Moderne Saint Germain

LOCATION
The Hotel Moderne Saint-Germain offers you a very central base for exploring Paris. Discover a district steeped in history with numerous major landmarks, including the Pantheon, the Luxembourg Gardens and Museum, Saint-Sulpice Church or the old Sorbonne University.

READ MORE
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
LOUNGE
The Hotel Moderne Saint-Germain offers its guests a pleasant lounge area to catch up with friends, connect to Internet, play table football or simply enjoy a relaxing break.

Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
SERVICES
Our multilingual reception team is available 24/7. In addition to organising taxis or restaurant bookings, they will be delighted to help you with any questions concerning your stay in Paris and help make it as carefree and relaxing as possible. Unfortunately pets are not allowed in the hotel. On the 6th floor the rooms benefit from a private balcony and are exclusively accessible by stairs.

READ MORE
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Breakfast
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
BREAKFAST
Our cheerful and fun breakfast room with its modern design welcomes you every morning from 7 to 10.30. Start your day in style with our delicious buffet breakfast complete with a choice of cereals, cheese board, yogurts, a variety of breads and croissants with jam, as well as hot and cold drinks.

Our multilingual reception team is available 24/7. In addition to organising taxis or restaurant bookings, they will be delighted to help you with any questions concerning your stay in Paris and help make it as carefree and relaxing as possible. Unfortunately pets are not allowed in the hotel. On the 6th floor the rooms benefit from a private balcony and are exclusively accessible by stairs.

We offer free Wi-Fi access throughout our hotel. If you need to connect to Internet, a computer with high speed connexion and printer is at your disposal in our comfortable lounge.

Using the context I provided you before, could you answer the following FAQs to be used as answers for a hotel chatbot. Be professional, helpful and detailed in your answers

Book a table:
Unfortunately, we do not have a restaurant on site and therefore do not take table reservations. However, our reception team will be more than happy to recommend local restaurants and help you make a reservation.

Breakfast:
We offer a delicious buffet breakfast in our cheerful and modern breakfast room every morning from 7am to 10:30am. The breakfast includes a selection of cereals, cheese board, yogurts, various breads and croissants with jam, as well as hot and cold drinks. If you have any dietary requirements, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

Cancellations:
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to the type of accommodation. Please check the specific conditions for the room you wish to book when making your selection. If you need to make any changes to your booking, please contact our 24-hour reception team as soon as possible.

Careers:
Thank you for your interest in working with us. To view our current vacancies, please visit our website or send your CV and a covering letter to our HR department at [email protected]

Casino:
We do not have a casino on site, but there are several casinos in Paris that can be easily reached by public transport or taxi. Our reception team can provide recommendations and assistance with bookings.

Check-in:
Check-in time is from 3pm. Please note that guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. If you are arriving outside of our reception hours, please let us know in advance so we can make arrangements for your check-in.

Check-out:
Check-out time is until 12pm. If you need a later check-out time, please contact our reception team who will do their best to accommodate you. Please note that a late check-out fee may apply.

Children policy:
Children of all ages are welcome to stay with us. Children under the age of 2 may stay free of charge in their parents' room and in existing bedding. We do not have any extra beds or cots available. Please make sure to include the number of children and their ages when making your booking.

Closing periods:
We are open all year round and do not have any closing periods.

Contacts:
You can find our contact details on our website or in your booking confirmation email. Alternatively, you can contact our reception team 24/7 for any assistance during your stay.

Covid-19:
The safety and wellbeing of our guests and staff is our top priority. We have implemented additional measures to ensure a safe and enjoyable stay with us, including enhanced cleaning and sanitation protocols, social distancing measures, and the mandatory use of face masks in indoor common areas. Please check our website for the latest information on our Covid-19 policies and procedures.

Discounts, Offers and Partnerships:
We occasionally offer special discounts and packages to our guests. Please check our website or contact our reception team for any current offers. We also have partnerships with local businesses and attractions, and can provide recommendations and assistance with bookings.

Golf:
We do not have a golf course on site, but there are several golf courses in Paris and the surrounding areas that can be easily reached by public transport or taxi. Our reception team can provide recommendations and assistance with bookings.

Kids clubs, Playgrounds, and Entertainment:
We do not have any kids clubs or playgrounds on site, but our reception team can provide recommendations for family-friendly activities and attractions in the local area.

Location:
Our hotel is located in the heart of Paris, within walking distance to many major landmarks and attractions. The Pantheon, the Luxembourg Gardens and Museum, Saint-Sulpice Church, and the old Sorbonne University are all nearby. Our reception team can provide recommendations for local transport and assist with bookings.

Manage bookings:
